title: Config file
description: This is the main confiration for a test

host.description: Website hostname for this test suite (only one)

muted.description: Mute Chrome entirely (only when not headless)

timeout.description: Default timeot (ms) used in all tests

close.description: Automatically close Chrome after finish (only when not headless)

output.description: Path to the output dir or disabling output (if false)

view.description: Open generated Viewer file in a browser after finish (if output is enabled)

viewport.description: Default viweport dimensions for all test cases

cookies.description: Cookies to set before running test cases

localStorage.description: Local Storage items to set before running test cases
